alert.note: Alert for Cole (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 6:49AM CDT until May 08 at 8:17AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following river in Missouri... Moreau River near Jefferson City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Moreau River near Jefferson City. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 AM CDT Friday was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 am Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Moreau River Jefferson City 17.0 24.5 11.5 6.8 5.0 3.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
